item.title: ğŸ½ï¸ Recetas
item.description: Note Usar post-its con fechas en tuppers. No lavar carne, solo secar con papel de cocina. Despensa: Sal, Azucar, MSG, Avecrem, Pimienta negra y blanca, Paprika Aceite de sesamo, salsa de soja, vinagre Vino de arroz, vinagre de arroz, vino blanco AlmidÃ³n de patata, maicena Comino en polvo, laurel, tomillo Sopas y cremas Sopa de maÃ­z, pollo, huevo ğŸ“º Freir jengibre picado, aÃ±adir agua y pechuga, unos 5 min AÃ±adir maiz, 3 min, aÃ±adir pechuga deshilachada, sal, azucar, avecrem Almidon de patata con agua para espesar, aÃ±adir huevo poco a poco, torbellino Un poco de pimienta blanca, aceite de sesamo Sopa de huevo y tomate ğŸ“º

item.title: ğŸ Python
item.description: â¬…ï¸Back to Roadmap ğŸ’¼ Jobs / ğŸ¥‹ Codewards Basics Use Google Colab to learn the basic syntax and concepts. Download Python and Visual Studio Code with the Python extension to start writing single file scripts. ğŸ“šIntroducing Python (2019): Ignore everything after chapter 11 ğŸ“Basic OOP ğŸ¨Skim through pep8 âš¡ï¸Learn a bit of DSA (Data Structures and Algorithms): do easy in neetcode Note Project ideas: Make a discord bot with discord.py Program a simple game with PyGame such as Snake Deploy a simple FastAPI website in Deta (maybe a TODO list) Advanced Switch to PyCharm once you are familiar with the syntax and concepts such as virtualenvs, git, etc.

item.title: ğŸ¿ï¸ Go

item.title: Projects
item.description: Here are some of my personal projects. Hollow Knight Hollow Knight Wikia Loved that game and decided to translate the english wikia into spanish. Hollow Knight Translator Tool to search of in-game translations. Final Degree Project (University) Generating quality 2D polygon meshes using Restricted Delaunay Triangulations. Other Acknowledged: Towards Explainability of On-board Satellite Scheduling for End User Interactions
